Initializer# init(duration:bounce:initialVelocity:)

iOS 17.0+iPadOS 17.0+Mac Catalyst 17.0+tvOS 17.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
@MainActor
init(
    duration: TimeInterval,
    bounce: CGFloat,
    initialVelocity velocity: CGVector
)
```
